value.title: Microsoft's Powerful Supercomputer Will Supercharge AI for Azure Developers
value.excerpt: At its online-only Build 2020, Microsoft unveils the fifth-most-powerful supercomputer on Earth, which is designed to run massive machine-learning AI projects, plus some new tools to ensure responsible use of AI.

images.title: Microsoft's Powerful Supercomputer Will Supercharge AI for Azure Developers

value.title: Microsoft Touts Supercomputer for Large-Scale AI Modeling
value.excerpt: Microsoft disclosed at Build that it has built one of the world's most powerful supercomputers in collaboration with a company building artificial intelligence (AI) solutions.

images.title: Microsoft Touts Supercomputer for Large-Scale AI Modeling

value.title: Search engines are leveraging AI to improve their language understanding
value.excerpt: Increasingly, search engines like Bing and Google are leveraging AI and machine learning to improve the quality of results.

images.title: Search engines are leveraging AI to improve their language understanding

value.title: Five questions for Microsoft EVP of Cloud and AI Scott Guthrie
value.excerpt: What's Microsoft's head of Cloud and AI been up to lately? What is he most excited about at Build 2020 and beyond? I asked and ScottGu (sort of) answered.

images.title: Five questions for Microsoft EVP of Cloud and AI Scott Guthrie

value.title: Microsoft’s new supercomputer will unlock AI opportunities that are ‘hard to even imagine’
value.excerpt: The supercomputer was built in partnership with and will be exclusively used by OpenAI, a San Francisco-based firm dedicated to the ethical implementation of AI. According to a Microsoft blog, the design of its supercomputer was informed by new developments in the field of AI research,

images.title: Microsoft’s new supercomputer will unlock AI opportunities that are ‘hard to even imagine’

value.title: Build 2020: Azure Stack Hub updated with six new features, including machine-learning tools
value.excerpt: Microsoft has announced a slew of up updates to its hybrid cloud platform at its Build 2020 developer conference, which is taking place virtually this year due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

images.title: Build 2020: Azure Stack Hub updated with six new features, including machine-learning tools

value.title: Microsoft builds massive supercomputer for smarter AI
value.excerpt: The Azure machine has 285,000 processor cores and 10,000 GPUs to tackle a new class of artificial intelligence tasks.

images.title: Microsoft builds massive supercomputer for smarter AI

value.title: Microsoft helps Sony power the world’s first AI image sensor with Azure
value.excerpt: Sony is the top image sensor supplier to the smartphone industry and has a presence in other segments as well. The IMX500 is designed to power enterprise systems such as industrial cameras for monitoring product lines.

images.title: Microsoft helps Sony power the world’s first AI image sensor with Azure

value.title: Microsoft launches new tools for building fairer machine learning models

value.title: Microsoft debuts WhiteNoise, an AI toolkit for differential privacy
value.excerpt: Microsoft debuted a number of privacy- and fairness-focused enhancements to Azure Machine Learning, including the WhiteNoise toolkit.

images.title: Microsoft debuts WhiteNoise, an AI toolkit for differential privacy

value.title: Azure Machine Learning gets Responsible ML innovations and more
value.excerpt: Microsoft has announced new capabilities to its cloud-based machine learning platform. A new project to advance machine teaching methods has also been released in the form of a public preview.

images.title: Azure Machine Learning gets Responsible ML innovations and more

value.title: Microsoft announces Azure Cognitive Services and Bot Service enhancements
value.excerpt: Not only have Microsoft's Bot Framework and Service been updated, but new AI functionality and language capabilities have been introduced for apps that leverage Azure Cognitive Services as well.

images.title: Microsoft announces Azure Cognitive Services and Bot Service enhancements

value.title: Microsoft's hybrid platform, Azure Stack Hub, gets management, machine learning updates
value.excerpt: Microsoft is adding some new incremental features to its hybrid Azure Stack Hub platform, and it's continuing its Azure Arc unified management push at Build 2020.

value.title: What’s the role of Microsoft Azure in the IoT sphere?
value.excerpt: An article by Kevin E. Kline, Principal Program Manager at SentryOne. Microsoft Azure is a cloud-based IaaS (infrastructure as a service) that has technically been around since 2008, and provides nearly two dozen categories of specific services.

value.title: Microsoft will integrate its Azure AI system into Sony's smart camera sensors
value.excerpt: Microsoft and Sony have formed a new partnership to apply the former's Azure AI capabilities to the latter's smart camera sensor system. The goal is to boost computer vision for enterprise settings.

images.title: Microsoft will integrate its Azure AI system into Sony's smart camera sensors

value.title: Microsoft and Sony to create smart camera solutions for AI-enabled image sensor
value.excerpt: Sony and Microsoft have joined together to create artificial intelligence-powered (AI) smart camera solutions to make it easier for enterprise customers to perform video analytics, the companies announced.

value.title: Microsoft and Sony partner to make smart cameras smarter with Azure AI
value.excerpt: Microsoft and Sony announced a partnership today that will bring Azure AI smarts to Sony's intelligent vision sensor IMX500. The combination is intended to result in faster analysis for enterprise scenarios.
